I invite all of you to join a new mailing list that is dedicated to defining
and implementing a RESTful messaging architecture.  The emphasis is on
simplicity, flexibility, and scalability.  We have had many discussions
about this topic in the past.  Now I want to put all of those thoughts to
some practical use and create a "REST success story".

The URL is: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/rest-messaging

---
Seairth Jacobs
seairth@...
